amendment.description: Amendment provides $5 million for the Court Training and Improvements Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section pertaining to reducing the amount available for Departmental Management-Salaries and Expenses and increasing the amount made available for Office on Violence Against Women-Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 405 - 25 (Roll no. 732).
